messages.subject: Folder in Files Section
messages.msgSnippet: I created a folder in the files section called WW2 Katana Pics . Sorry for the quality, they were taken with a camera phone. I have a close up of the tsuba
messages.messageBody:
I created a folder in the files section called "WW2 Katana Pics". Sorry
for the quality, they were taken with a camera phone. I have a close up
of the tsuba and other parts of it. The close up of the blade, showing
the hada, is pretty fuzzy. In my opinion, the hada and hamon on the
blade are dead giveaways, to me, that the sword is fake. But let me
know what you guys think.
